```{r}
predict <- function(GPA, IQ, Gender)
{
  return <- 50+20*GPA+0.07*IQ+35*Gender+0.01*GPA*IQ-10*GPA*Gender;
}

result <- predict(4, 199, 1)
result
50+20*GPA+0.07*IQ+35+0.01*GPA*IQ-10*GPA
85+10.01*GPA+0.07*IQ+0.01*GPA*IQ

50+20*GPA+0.07*IQ+0.01*GPA*IQ


```
